text: Here's how to delete photos from Facebook
on your desktop and mobile device.
To delete Facebook photos on your desktop,
log in to your account

and click on your name
in the top right corner.
This will take you to your profile.
Next, click "Photos," then "Your Photos."
To delete individual photos,
click on the pencil icon in the top right,
then scroll down and click "Delete Photo."
A window will appear asking if you're sure
you want to delete the photo.
Click "Delete."
To delete an entire album, click "Albums"

and click the ellipsis
on the right of the album
you're looking to delete.
Scroll down and click "Delete album"

and confirm by clicking
"Delete Album" again.

To delete Facebook photos
on your mobile app,

tap the hamburger icon
on the bottom right,
then tap "See your profile."
Next, scroll down and tap "Photos,"
then tap "Uploads."
Tap into the photo you want to delete
and tap the ellipsis on the top right.
Then hit "Delete Photo"
and confirm you want to delete it.
